markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Conundrum Spectacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1468)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These wire spectacles have been fitted with circular glass lenses. While wearing the spectacles, you gain a +1 item bonus to Decipher Writing. 

<document level="2" id="action-1108" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"

>
Conundrum Spectacles (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2, and the activated effect can be used up to three times per day.
name: Conundrum Spectacles (Greater)
